verbs.description: They [V: are] supporting a free Palestine , opposed to President Donald Trump 's recognition of Jerusalem as the capital of Israel .
[ARG0: They] are [V: supporting] [ARG1: a free Palestine , opposed to President Donald Trump 's recognition of Jerusalem as the capital of Israel] .
